cta_whatsapp_message: Hello, I am interested in Lumena. Please contact me.
project_info_title: A New Era of Premium Workspaces in Dubai
project_info_text:
Lumena introduces a refined vision of ultra-premium commercial real estate in Business Bay. Developed by Omniyat, this architectural landmark is designed for forward-thinking companies and private investors seeking prestige, performance, and a statement address.

With its sculptural design, waterfront positioning in Marasi Bay, and Grade A office floors, Lumena redefines what a corporate headquarters can be — blending architectural artistry with intelligent spatial planning.
amenities_title: Amenities and spaces designed for refined business living
map_text: Located in Business Bay’s prestigious Marasi Bay waterfront district, Lumena offers immediate access to Downtown Dubai, DIFC, and Sheikh Zayed Road. Positioned at the core of Dubai’s commercial ecosystem, the project combines connectivity with iconic skyline and canal views.
footer_tagline: Premium commercial offices in Business Bay
